settings.text: YES! You can still purchase any of our products after applying for the pro store. You will need to upload a certificate in relation to any of the products we will sell as proof that you are a trained industry professional and hold a current ABN / ACN.

settings.dropdown: Can I purchase products from the Pro Store if I have not trained with BB Glow?

settings.text: We accept any reputable / accredited certificates in Mesotherapy, Skin needling, BB Glow, Skin / chemical peels, Cosmetic Tattooing, Beauty diploma / certificate & more.

settings.dropdown: What certificates are accepted for the Pro Store?

settings.text: Our Pro store is a wholesale store, therefore it is password protected to protect all of our salons, clients & partners. Some of our products contain certain ingredients that require a certificate to be purchased.

settings.dropdown: Why is the Pro Store password protected?

settings.text: No, our courses are designed to accommodate any skill level, from beginners looking to get into the industry to nurses, aestheticians and industry professionals.

settings.dropdown: Are there any prerequisites required to apply for any of the training courses?

settings.text: Our live courses are 1 day courses & our online training can be done and completed in your own time. From the initial day of acceptance for our online courses you will have 6 months to complete your course.

settings.dropdown: How long does it take to complete any of the training on offer?

settings.text: Yes we do! We offer interest free payment plans through ZIP & Latitude pay.

settings.quote: I did my BB Glow training with bb glow Australia after I had originally booked with another company who's training I was not happy with, BB Glow Australia's training and kit exceeded my expectations and the support group has been great! I am very happy and confident with the training & ongoing support.
settings.author: La'Belle Aesthetics

settings.quote: I've been doing BB Glow with Tatiana for the past year and I couldn't be happier! This is the only procedure which has helped to even out my skin tone! I respected her honesty about the expectations of the procedure & was amazed by the results! Friendly service and private sessions!
settings.author: The Cosmetic Diary
